editable.description: Optional Editable of the issue set, default is non-enitable

nonFungible.description: Optional Unique of the issue set, default is fungible. When issue set is non-fungible, transfer rate not work and is ignore.

transferRate.description: Optional The fee to charge when users transfer this accountâ€™s issuances, as the decimal amount that must be sent to deliver 1 unit. Has precision up to 9 digits beyond the decimal point. Use null to set no fee. Default is 0.
